suncertify.client
Class DataModel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--suncertify.client.DataModel
public class DataModel
extends java.lang.Object

Implements bussiness rules for booking and searching flights used by the underlying model and others truly services such as getting schema, origin airports and destin airports. All the methods will notify the listeners bound to this class.

Version:
1.2 31 Mar 2003
Author:
Francisco Carlos

loadDatabase

public void loadDatabase()
                  throws FBNException
Read all records from database and following notify all listeners bound to this class

Throws:
FBNException - Thrown if happened something unexpected error at the communnications or at the server

searchFlights

public void searchFlights(java.lang.String origin,
                          java.lang.String destination)
                   throws FBNException
Searches the flights based on origin airport and destin one It is possible a string "ANY" ( no case sensitive ) to search all the airports

Parameters:
origin - A String indicates the origin aiport
destination - A String indicates the destin aiport
Throws:
FBNException - Thrown if happened something unexpected error at the communnications or at the server
FBNException

close

public void close()
           throws FBNException
Closes the connection to database If the client-side application is startup in the local mode, then just closes the dababase. If the client-side application is startup in the remote mode, then unlock all records locked previouly for that clients

Throws:
FBNException - Thrown if something unexpected happened in the communictaions or at the server end
FBNException
